name: Phoenix Packaging
tag_list: customized-bottles, bottle-designer, glass-bottle-manufacturer, plastic-bottle-manufacturer, wine-bottle-design, glass-bottle-design, pharmaceutical-bottles, ceramic-bottles
overview:
Phoenix is a company employing creative bottle designers who will not limit clients with a catalogue or stocked models. That is why we let your imagination, creativity and budget set the limits to what we can create or supply to you.

Take Advantage of our Network of Innovative Glass and Plastic Bottle Manufacturers

Phoenix is the result of many years of experience. We understand the need to evolve and adapt to new market demands. In our quest to meet our clientâ€™s needs, we actively search for new ceramic, plastic and glass manufacturing sources around the globe while keeping abreast of the newest technologies.

As a glass bottle designers , we use our vast sourcing and network to match our client’s needs with the appropriate manufacturing facilities.

Phoenix is a creative bottle designer. We realize that the package enhances and adds value to each and every product. Our bottle creations can be found in the pharmaceutical, fragrance, cosmetic, personal care and food and beverage industries.
